text: The Grevemberg House is a historic mansion in Franklin, Louisiana, U.S.. It was built in 1851, a decade prior to the American Civil War. It was designed in the Greek Revival architectural style. It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since June 6, 1980. The house is located in Franklin's City Park, on Sterling Road. It was moved to this location. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Louisiana Category:Greek Revival houses in Louisiana Category:Houses completed in 1851 Category:Houses in St. Mary Parish, Louisiana Category:Antebellum architecture
title: Grevemberg House
